amendatorysection.catchline: Nonresident; violating terms of order; effect.
amendatorysection.para: Any nonresident who violates the terms of the court or administrative order by which his or her operator's license or driving privilege was revoked, suspended, or impounded shall be subject to section 60-4,108.

annotation.para: Defendant's analysis of this section failed to take into account other sections of statute. State v. Smith, 181 Neb. 846, 152 N.W.2d 16 (1967).
